name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本社

description: The headquarters of Galley-La Company, Water 7's premier shipbuilding company. The building suffered fire damage from CP9's attack.

keyEvents.title: Chopper's Heroic Rescue
keyEvents.description: Chopper escapes the burning building with Paulie and Iceburg on his back, saving their lives.
keyEvents.significance: The rescue operation at the burning Galley-La headquarters earns the Straw Hats respect from Water 7 citizens.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg Reveals the Truth
keyEvents.description: After recovering at Galley-La, Iceburg reveals to Nami the truth about Robin's sacrifice.
keyEvents.significance: This location becomes the site of the pivotal revelation that sets the Straw Hats on their rescue mission.

description: A city built on water, famous for its shipbuilding industry. The setting for the revelation of Robin's sacrifice and the beginning of the Enies Lobby rescue mission.

keyEvents.title: Buster Call Threat Revealed
keyEvents.description: CP9 threatened to initiate a Buster Call on Water 7 if Robin didn't cooperate.
keyEvents.significance: Water 7 was threatened with the same devastating attack that destroyed Ohara, forcing Robin's hand.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Set Adrift
keyEvents.description: The Galley-La foremen release the Going Merry to drift out to sea from Water 7.
keyEvents.significance: This marks the beginning of the end for the Straw Hats' beloved first ship.

description: Franky's hideout and base of operations for the Franky Family in Water 7.

keyEvents.title: Franky Recognizes Spandam
keyEvents.description: At Franky House, Franky recognizes Spandam's voice from his past.
keyEvents.significance: This recognition connects Franky's backstory to the current CP9 threat.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Captures Franky
keyEvents.description: CP9 agents led by Rob Lucci storm Franky House and capture Franky.
keyEvents.significance: Franky's capture at his own base demonstrates CP9's power and sets up his transport to Enies Lobby.

name.japanese: ウォーターセブン海列車駅

description: The Sea Train station in Water 7 where passengers board the Puffing Tom to travel to other islands.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Locates Robin
keyEvents.description: Sanji successfully tracks Robin to the Sea Train station where CP9 is preparing to transport her.
keyEvents.significance: This discovery provides the Straw Hats with the opportunity to intercept Robin before she's taken to Enies Lobby.

description: An island near Water 7 used as a dumping ground for derelict ships that can no longer sail.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Set Adrift
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry is released to drift toward Scrap Island where broken ships go to be destroyed.
keyEvents.significance: This foreshadows the eventual fate of the Going Merry and represents the end of an era for the Straw Hats.

description: Iceburg's private bedroom where he was attacked by CP9 and where Robin confronted him about the Pluton blueprints.

keyEvents.title: Robin Confronts Iceburg
keyEvents.description: In flashback, Robin confronts Iceburg in his bedroom, defending her motivations and revealing the CP9 ultimatum.
keyEvents.significance: This private confrontation reveals Robin's emotional state and the impossible choice she faced.
